sentences.en: All at pandemonium broke out again and it was impossible to hear what anybody was saying.

sentences.en: And despite the pandemonium, the avid shopper had taken his time to browse the shops.
sentences.cn: 不管有多混乱, 这位狂热的购物者总会从容不迫地去购物.

sentences.en: I had found Adlai unperturbed in the midst of pandemonium.
sentences.cn: 我觉得艾德莱在一片大混乱中仍然镇定自若.

sentences.en: Pandemonium broke out as they ran into the street shouting.
sentences.cn: 他们叫嚷着冲到大街上，大街上顿时乱作一团。

sentences.en: Pandemonium broke out when the news was announced.
sentences.cn: 这消息一宣布，立即乱成一片。

sentences.en: Pandemonium reigned in the classroom until the teacher arrived.
sentences.cn: 教师来到之前教室里乱哄哄的.

sentences.en: Shrill cries and startled oaths flew up around us as pandemonium broke out.
sentences.cn: 骚乱爆发时，我们周围充斥着尖厉的哭喊声和难以入耳的咒骂声。

sentences.en: The fumes began seeping through the trains and stations, and pandemonium ensued.
sentences.cn: 毒气随即开始弥漫整个车厢,车站, 马上引起了一场大混乱.

sentences.en: The whole lobby was a perfect pandemonium, and the din was terrific.
sentences.cn: 整个门厅一片嘈杂, 而且喧嚣刺耳.

sentences.en: There was complete pandemonium in the kitchen.
There was pandemonium in court as the judge gave his summing up.
sentences.cn: 法官做总结时，法庭里一片混乱。

sentences.cn: 我想要的是子宫般的安全与保护, 命运便降生我于这尘嚣.

sentences.en: When the tone finally came through , there was pandemonium in the mission control room.
sentences.cn: 乐曲终于响起,控制室内一片沸腾.

sentences.en: When the verdict was read pandemonium broke out in the courtroom.
sentences.cn: 宣判的时候法庭上乱成一团。

sentences.en: Working in collusion , one from within and the other from without , they created pandemonium.
sentences.cn: 他们里应外合, 把时局搞得乌烟瘴气.
